pages.text: A soul is not always part of a sentient body, if nature is not sentient that is. Travelling the world, occultists have found that, as implied, the nature does have a hint of souls, called $(marked)influences$().

Not all places have influences, they are actually rather rare. In order to check the influence of a chunk, a $(l:vitalis/entry_heart_human)$(item)Human Heart$() may be used, though this will consume Magan, but not the heart itself.$(br)It should be noted that although influences incorporate souls, legendary souls, or even more extraordinary ones, may not be found as influences.
